class.rdfs:comment: The frequency in MHz and the modulation used for a particular BroadcastService.
class.rdfs:label: BroadcastFrequencySpecification

schema:broadcastFrequencyValue.rdfs:comment: The frequency in MHz for a particular broadcast.
schema:broadcastFrequencyValue.rdfs:label: broadcastFrequencyValue

schema:broadcastSignalModulation.rdfs:comment: The modulation (e.g. FM, AM, etc) used by a particular broadcast service.
schema:broadcastSignalModulation.rdfs:label: broadcastSignalModulation

schema:broadcastSubChannel.rdfs:comment: The subchannel used for the broadcast.
schema:broadcastSubChannel.rdfs:label: broadcastSubChannel
